item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 25, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:

12. Masks, Smoke, and Mirrors: The story of EgyptAir flight 804 (167 points | 77 comments)

22. Jujutsu Megamerges and jj Absorb (44 points | 11 comments)

26. Are Immutable Linux Distros right for you? (66 points | 48 comments)
27. Gordon Mah Ung has died (115 points | 17 comments)
